credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Wide steel blade, slightly up-curved lower edge, angled end, pointed. Tang with button end. Handle eight-sided. Brass scales on major plane engraved with wriggle work; four sides of bone; two exposed tang sides. Handle end with 24 laminated sections of tri-color horn and brass plates. Plain brass end.
name: Knife
